text: General Sir John Chalmers McColl, (born 17 April 1952) is a retired senior British Army officer. He was the Lieutenant Governor of Jersey from 2011 until 2016. McColl was Deputy Supreme Allied Commander Europe from 2007 to 2011.General McColl visits Culford Culford School, 21 September 2007 ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Jersey
title: John McColl (British Army officer)
